channel.title: github on Einführung in Swift und SwiftUI
channel.description: Recent content in github on Einführung in Swift und SwiftUI

item.title: Einführung
item.description: GitHub GitHub ist ein Onlinedienst zur kollaborativen Versionsverwaltung für Softwareprojekte. GitHub gehört zu Microsoft und hat über 80 Mio. Nutzer. einführung gh-pages jekyll markdown mermaid links GitHub Seiten: Topics - browse popular topics on GitHub Trending- see what the GitHub community is most excited about today Collections - curated lists and insight into burgeoning industries, topics, and communities Swift - Swift Repositories auf GitHub Glossary - dieses Glossar führt in die gängige Git- und GitHub-Terminologie ein Blog - Blog auf GitHub Links: wiki

item.title: GitHub Links
item.description: Links https://docs.github.com/de Verschlüsselung [https://docs.github.com/de](http://<a href=)/pages/getting-started-with-github-pages/securing-your-github-pages-site-with-https">https://docs.github.com/de/pages/getting-started-with-github-pages/securing-your-github-pages-site-with-https GitHub action https://www.youtube.com/@GitHub What is GitHub Actions? GitHub, 2022, 1 min GitHub Actions Crash Course Laith Harb, 2022, 43 min GitHub Actions Tutorial - Basic Concepts and CI/CD Pipeline with Docker Nana Janashia, 2021, 33 min GitHub Actions Tutorial | From Zero to Hero in 90 minutes (Environments, Secrets, Runners, etc) Davide Benvegnu, 2021, 86 min Automate EVERYTHING with GitHub Actions! Davide Benvegnu, 2019, 15 min Get Started With Github Actions Kahan Data Solutions, 2021, 11 min Schedule Python Scripts with GitHub Actions FOR FREE | Python Automation Patrick Löber, 2022, 13 min

item.title: Links
